text: Stay :muscle: push-up friends! I have to repeat days too... It's not a race or a competition, it's the joy of seeing steady progress and feeling yourself literally push away the problems of the world, one rep at a time
Ah I’m about to do mine!
Doing mine when I get in.
I added sit ups, pull ups, and squats to the rotation this weekend.
Sore.
<@U02E3CRMA>: i just bought a pull-up bar over the weekend. Once I’m able to do one I’ll be in the same boat.
I had to lie and put “1” in for max reps so that the app would give me a training program. :confused:
#cyclistproblems
I plan on just hanging from mine & crying.
haha
you _are_ a designer, after all
I like my computer.
jumping pull-ups (where you stand on something, jump yourself up until chin above the bar, then slowly lower down) is a good way to start
good idea!
Ima do that. I’ve got a Spartan race to do where i’m going to have to pull myself up a lot.
I learned using resistance bands (attach a band to the bar, put your knee or foot in there, do pull-ups, then progress with thinner and thinner bands over time)
good to know that work
Sounds scary!
was going to try, but feared all the ways it could go so, painfully wrong
Squats suck.
So do pull ups.
